001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ClockPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageMetadata;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageType;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
013import java.util.ArrayDeque;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Deque;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018
019/**
020 * Reconstructs TN3270 Telnet records into high-level message events.
021 * <p>Handles host-first message ordering and Telnet negotiations. Not thread-safe.</p>
022 *
023 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
024 */
025public final class Tn3270MessageReconstructor implements MessageReconstructor {
026  private final ClockPort clock;
027  private final Tn3270Metrics metrics;
028
029  private DirectionState client;
030  private DirectionState server;
031  private final Deque<String> pendingTransactionIds = new ArrayDeque<>();
032
033  /**
034   * Creates a reconstructor bound to the supplied clock and metrics sink.
035   *
036   * @param clock clock used for timestamping generated events
037   * @param metrics metrics sink used to record TN3270 reconstruction statistics
038   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code clock} or {@code metrics} is {@code null}
039   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
040   */  public Tn3270MessageReconstructor(ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics) {
041    this.clock = clock;
042    this.metrics = new Tn3270Metrics(metrics);
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Initializes per-direction decoders and clears pending transactions.
047   *
048   * @implNote Resets Telnet decoders for client and server directions.
049   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
050   */  @Override
051  public void onStart() {
052    client = new DirectionState(true);
053    server = new DirectionState(false);
054    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Decodes incoming bytes into Telnet records and produces TN3270 message events.
059   *
060   * @param slice contiguous TCP bytes with orientation metadata; must not be {@code null}
061   * @return ordered list of reconstructed TN3270 messages; may be empty
062   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code slice} is {@code null}
063   * @implNote Splits Telnet records on IAC EOR boundaries and manages host-first transaction ids.
064   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
065   */  @Override
066  public List<MessageEvent> onBytes(ByteStream slice) {
067    metrics.onBytes(slice.data().length);
068    DirectionState dir = slice.fromClient() ? client : server;
069
070    List<byte[]> records = dir.feed(slice.data(), 0, slice.data().length);
071    List<MessageEvent> events = new ArrayList<>(records.size());
072    for (byte[] record : records) {
073      boolean fromClient = slice.fromClient();
074      MessageType type = fromClient ? MessageType.REQUEST : MessageType.RESPONSE;
075      String transactionId;
076      if (!fromClient) {
077        transactionId = TransactionId.newId();
078        pendingTransactionIds.addLast(transactionId);
079      } else {
080        transactionId = pendingTransactionIds.isEmpty()
081            ? TransactionId.newId()
082            : pendingTransactionIds.removeFirst();
083      }
084      ByteStream stream = new ByteStream(slice.flow(), fromClient, record, slice.timestampMicros());
085      MessageMetadata metadata = new MessageMetadata(transactionId, Map.of());
086      events.add(new MessageEvent(ProtocolId.TN3270, type, stream, metadata));
087    }
088    return events;
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Releases buffered state and clears pending transaction ids.
093   *
094   * @implNote Flushes Telnet decoder buffers to avoid cross-session leakage.
095   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
096   */  @Override
097  public void onClose() {
098    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
099    client.reset();
100    server.reset();
101  }
102
103  private static final class DirectionState {
104    private final boolean fromClient;
105    private final TelnetRecordDecoder decoder = new TelnetRecordDecoder();
106
107    DirectionState(boolean fromClient) {
108      this.fromClient = fromClient;
109    }
110
111    List<byte[]> feed(byte[] data, int off, int len) {
112      return decoder.feed(data, off, len);
113    }
114
115    void reset() {
116      decoder.reset();
117    }
118  }
119
120  private static final class TelnetRecordDecoder {
121    private static final int IAC = 0xFF;
122    private static final int SB = 0xFA;
123    private static final int SE = 0xF0;
124    private static final int EOR = 0xEF;
125    private static final int WILL = 0xFB;
126    private static final int WONT = 0xFC;
127    private static final int DO = 0xFD;
128    private static final int DONT = 0xFE;
129
130    private final ByteRing record = new ByteRing(1024);
131    private boolean pendingIac = false;
132    private boolean inSubneg = false;
133    private int awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
134
135    List<byte[]> feed(byte[] data, int off, int len) {
136      List<byte[]> out = null;
137      for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
138        int b = data[off + i] & 0xFF;
139        if (awaitingOptionCmd != 0) {
140          awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
141          continue;
142        }
143        if (!pendingIac) {
144          if (b == IAC) {
145            pendingIac = true;
146            continue;
147          }
148          if (!inSubneg) {
149            record.write((byte) b);
150          }
151          continue;
152        }
153        pendingIac = false;
154        switch (b) {
155          case IAC -> record.write((byte) IAC);
156          case SB -> inSubneg = true;
157          case SE -> inSubneg = false;
158          case WILL, WONT, DO, DONT -> awaitingOptionCmd = b;
159          case EOR -> {
160            if (!record.isEmpty()) {
161              if (out == null) out = new ArrayList<>();
162              out.add(record.take());
163            }
164          }
165          default -> { /* ignore */ }
166        }
167      }
168      return out == null ? List.of() : out;
169    }
170
171    void reset() {
172      record.clear();
173      pendingIac = false;
174      inSubneg = false;
175      awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
176    }
177
178    private static final class ByteRing {
179      private byte[] buf;
180      private int size;
181
182      ByteRing(int cap) {
183        buf = new byte[Math.max(256, cap)];
184        size = 0;
185      }
186
187      void write(byte b) {
188        ensureCapacity(1);
189        buf[size++] = b;
190      }
191
192      boolean isEmpty() {
193        return size == 0;
194      }
195
196      byte[] take() {
197        byte[] out = new byte[size];
198        System.arraycopy(buf, 0, out, 0, size);
199        size = 0;
200        return out;
201      }
202
203      void clear() {
204        size = 0;
205      }
206
207      private void ensureCapacity(int extra) {
208        int needed = size + extra;
209        if (needed <= buf.length) return;
210        int n = buf.length;
211        while (n < needed) n <<= 1;
212        byte[] nb = new byte[n];
213        System.arraycopy(buf, 0, nb, 0, size);
214        buf = nb;
215      }
216    }
217  }
218}
219
220
